certifications.what_it_means: Meets energy efficiency criteria with independent verification.
certifications.limitations: Energy-efficiency only; does not cover materials, labor, or packaging.

certifications.what_it_means: Defined sourcing models for forest-based materials tied to the FSC system.
certifications.limitations: Applies to forest-based materials/paper/wood, not full product lifecycle.

certifications.what_it_means: Regulated organic production/processing reviewed by accredited certifying agents.
certifications.limitations: Covers organic rules, not carbon, packaging, or fair labor outcomes.

certifications.what_it_means: Products meeting internationally agreed Fairtrade Standards.
certifications.limitations: Primarily supply-chain standards; does not guarantee low environmental impact across all stages.

certifications.what_it_means: Participation in the RA sustainability certification standard for farms/companies.
certifications.limitations: Scope depends on product type; not a full lifecycle carbon claim.

certifications.what_it_means: Company-level certification assessed against B Lab Standards with independent assurance.
certifications.limitations: Company-level, not product-specific; does not certify individual SKU sustainability.

certifications.what_it_means: Textiles tested for harmful substances against program criteria.
certifications.limitations: Product safety/chemicals focus; does not cover climate, durability, or labor.

certifications.what_it_means: Requirements for organic textiles from raw material through processing with environmental and social criteria.
certifications.limitations: Textile-focused; does not validate other parts of a mixed-material product.

certifications.what_it_means: Lifecycle-based ecolabel for electronics with Bronze/Silver/Gold tiers.
certifications.limitations: Category-dependent; check registry for current entry.

certifications.what_it_means: Multi-attribute third-party certification covering multiple sustainability categories.
certifications.limitations: Product-specific; scope depends on certified product and standard version.

certifications.what_it_means: Chemical ingredients evaluated to meet criteria for safer chemistry and performance.
certifications.limitations: Ingredient safety focus; does not imply low carbon or ethical sourcing.

certifications.what_it_means: Amazon marketplace badge indicating the product has at least one qualifying sustainability certification.
certifications.limitations: Aggregator badge â€” the underlying certification varies. Check which specific cert qualifies this product.
